name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Ring of Strength
description: A magical ring that enhances the wearer's strength.
looks: The ring is made of shining gold with a large emerald set in the center.

special_effects.power_boost: Increases damage dealt by the wearer.

name: Spellbook of Healing
description: A spellbook containing powerful healing spells.
looks: The spellbook is bound with leather and has intricate symbols and runes etched on the cover. It radiates a soothing aura.

special_effects.healing_mastery: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A staff infused with healing magic, capable of restoring health.
looks: The staff is made of polished oak and emits a soft glow. It has intricate carvings of leaves and vines along its length.

special_effects.healing_touch: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells and abilities.

name: Staff of Wisdom
description: A staff imbued with the knowledge and wisdom of ancient scholars.
looks: The staff is made of a polished hickory wood and is adorned with intricate engravings of ancient symbols. At the top of the staff, there is a glowing crystal that emits a soft blue light.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that has the power to heal wounds and restore vitality.
looks: The staff is made of polished maple wood and is adorned with golden accents. It has a crystal orb at the top that glows with a soothing light.

special_effects.healing_aura: Creates a healing aura around the wielder, restoring HP to nearby allies

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that is capable of healing wounds and curing ailments.
looks: The staff is made of polished white wood with intricate carvings of healing symbols. It glows softly with a gentle blue light.

special_effects.healing_touch: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells.
